name: Stardust Breaker
description:
Arkanoid clone in modern style

• Many levels with enemies and bosses.

• Smooth gameplay (60 fps) as always.

• Play with everything (Touch , Joystick/Joypad , Mouse , Keyboard).

• Gameplay style and fill like "Arkanoid" old school original game.

• Archivements and bonus coins to help you play more.

• Level Editor to create your own levels.
